alfredsnippet.name: Performs stable sorting of an array, preserving the initial indexes of items when their values are the same.
alfredsnippet.snippet:
const stableSort = (arr, compare) =>
  arr
    .map((item, index) => ({ item, index }))
    .sort((a, b) => compare(a.item, b.item) || a.index - b.index)
    .map(({ item }) => item);
